author: wrowe
msg: We needed to fix the fix of .mak files to prevent insane amounts
of recursion, because VS98 wasn't quite exporting the post-build
targets appropriatly, and didn't respect the RECURSE flag.
(This won't be applied to 0.9, we aren't working with .manifests
